publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4786 Stewart Stevenson: Prison Staff Assaulted in the Course of their Duties—That the Parliament expresses its concern at the number of assaults perpetrated by prisoners against prison staff in the course of their duties in Scotland’s prisons; notes that 4% (169) of prison staff were the victims of such assaults in 2005-06; condemns the actions of the perpetrators of such assaults, and expresses its support for the work that prison staff do in what is an extremely demanding working environment.

S2M-4786 Prison Staff Assaulted in the Course of their Duties (lodged on 12 September 2006) Phil Gallie*, Pauline McNeill*, Jim Mather*, Bruce Crawford*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Fergus Ewing*, Brian Adam*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Alex Johnstone*, Rob Gibson*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Richard Lochhead*, Margaret Mitchell*, Colin Fox*, Michael Matheson*, Alex Neil*, Mr Jim Wallace*
S2M-4786 Prison Staff Assaulted in the Course of their Duties (lodged on 12 September 2006) Trish Godman*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Patrick Harvie*, Mike Pringle*, Mr Jamie Stone*

S2M-4786 Stewart Stevenson: Prison Staff Assaulted in the Course of their Duties—That the Parliament expresses its concern at the number of assaults perpetrated by prisoners against prison staff in the course of their duties in Scotland’s prisons; notes that 4% (169) of prison staff were the victims of such assaults in 2005-06; condemns the actions of the perpetrators of such assaults, and expresses its support for the work that prison staff do in what is an extremely demanding working environment. Supported by: Phil Gallie, Pauline McNeill, Jim Mather, Bruce Crawford, Roseanna Cunningham, Fergus Ewing, Brian Adam, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Ms Sandra White, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Alex Johnstone, Rob Gibson, Ms Maureen Watt, Richard Lochhead, Margaret Mitchell, Colin Fox, Michael Matheson, Alex Neil, Mr Jim Wallace, Trish Godman, Dr Elaine Murray, Patrick Harvie, Mike Pringle, Mr Jamie Stone, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4786 Prison Staff Assaulted in the Course of their Duties (lodged on 12 September 2006) Margaret Smith*
S2M-4786 Prison Staff Assaulted in the Course of their Duties (lodged on 12 September 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-4786 Prison Staff Assaulted in the Course of their Duties (lodged on 12 September 2006) Mrs Nanette Milne*
S2M-4786 Prison Staff Assaulted in the Course of their Duties (lodged on 12 September 2006) Murdo Fraser*, Murray Tosh*
S2M-4786 Prison Staff Assaulted in the Course of their Duties (lodged on 12 September 2006) Shiona Baird*
S2M-4786 Prison Staff Assaulted in the Course of their Duties (lodged on 12 September 2006) Mr Bruce McFee*
S2M-4786 Prison Staff Assaulted in the Course of their Duties (lodged on 12 September 2006) Dave Petrie*, Karen Gillon*
